languages.text: {n}Соломон неторопливо встает и протягивает вам руку.{/n} "Кажется, на Тассере я задолжал тебе танец".
{n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон неторопливо встает и протягивает вам руку.{/n} "Кажется, на Тассере я задолжал тебе танец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."
{n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."
{n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."
{n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."
{n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはゆっくりと立ち上がり、あなたに手を差し伸べた。{/n}「タッセーラでの借りを返さなければ。あなたにダンスの約束をしていたはずです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはゆっくりと立ち上がり、あなたに手を差し伸べた。{/n}「タッセーラでの借りを返さなければ。あなたにダンスの約束をしていたはずです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne steht ohne Hast auf und reicht dir seine Hand.{/n} "Ich habe noch eine Schuld von Thassera zu begleichen. Ich denke, ich schulde Euch einen Tanz."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne steht ohne Hast auf und reicht dir seine Hand.{/n} "Ich habe noch eine Schuld von Thassera zu begleichen. Ich denke, ich schulde Euch einen Tanz."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se lève avec nonchalance avant de vous tendre la main.{/n} « J'ai une dette envers vous, depuis Thassera. Il me semble que je vous dois une danse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se lève avec nonchalance avant de vous tendre la main.{/n} « J'ai une dette envers vous, depuis Thassera. Il me semble que je vous dois une danse. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se pone en pie lentamente y te extiende una mano.{/n} «Tengo una deuda pendiente con usted desde Thassera. Me parece que le debo un baile».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se pone en pie lentamente y te extiende una mano.{/n} «Tengo una deuda pendiente con usted desde Thassera. Me parece que le debo un baile».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙不慌不忙地站起身，向你伸出了手。{/n}“我在塔瑟拉欠下的债还没还呢。我相信，我还欠你一支舞蹈。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙不慌不忙地站起身，向你伸出了手。{/n}“我在塔瑟拉欠下的债还没还呢。我相信，我还欠你一支舞蹈。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, yavaşça ayaklanıp elini uzatıyor.{/n} "Thassera'da borçlanmıştım. Sana bir dans borcum var."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne yavaşça ayaklanır ve elini uzatır.{/n} "Thassera'da borçlanmıştım. Size bir dans borcum var."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne unhurriedly draws himself to his feet and extends his hand to you.{/n} "I have a debt from Thassera to repay. I believe I owe you a dance."
